{{Infobox set | image = Yu-Gi-Oh! TCG new logo.jpg | en_name = Ancient Prophecy Sneak Peek Participation Card | fr_name = Ancienne Prophétie Avant-première | de_name = Ancient Prophecy Sneak Peek | it_name = Antica Profezia Sneak Peek | es_name = Profecía Antigua Presentación | type = Participation card | series = Sneak Peek Participation Cards | prefix = ANPR | postfix = SP | size = 1 | en_database_id = 1121208007 | fr_database_id = 3121207003 | de_database_id = 2121208004 | it_database_id = 4121207003 | es_database_id = 5121207002 | en_release_date = August 15, 2009 | fr/de/it/sp_release_date = | prev = Raging Battle Sneak Peek Participation Card | next = Stardust Overdrive Sneak Peek Participation Card }} The '''''Ancient Prophecy'' Sneak Peek participation card''' is a promotional card that was given to participants at ''[[Ancient Prophecy]]'' [[Sneak Peek]] events, which were held on August 15–16, 2009. ==Galleries== Yu-Gi-Oh!
